p.e:
Dear Saf

After all of this time in 
anyland I have got worse
by the day, as my anger
and selfishness grew so did
my loneliness. When I
finally found a cure for this
suffering I was truly happy,
sadly I am losing her now
and as she walks out the 
door so does my hope in
my future in Anyland, 
I write this to inform you
that by the time this letter
is read I will be gone.
You were my best friend 
and deep down I always
both enjoyed and needed
your company.
Please do not be angry at 
her, it was my fualt all of this
happened.
                 Good luck-Ben
